context.p: When a user creates an account using the Dashboard, an administrator must approve or reject the account. You will receive an email from Eucalyptus when this account is ready for you to approve or reject it.
context.note: Accounts created through the CLI are automatically confirmed. There is no email sent and no action needed on your part.

step.cmd: Click Accounts in the Quick Links section.
Click the ID of the account you want to approve.
step.stepresult: The account, name, and Registration status are highlighted.
The Approve selected accounts popup displays.

step.cmd: Verify that the displayed account is the one you want, and click OK.

taskbody.result: The account's registration status displays as CONFIRMED on the Accounts page.
